comment: Raburn is the best Spanish professor at KSU. Amazing man, very friendly and helpful, and incredibly knowledgable in his field. He is more helpful than the professors who are native speakers, and goes out of his way to help students understand everything.

I really like this guy. He is the most laid back professor I've ever had. I've had a little more trouble in this class compared to 1001 and 1002, but his teaching is effective. If you show up to class, his lectures are beneficial.

Professor Raburn is the absolute best. I have had many spanish teachers growing up and he is by far one of the best. He tells stories about his experiences around the world and keeps you interested. he even brings candy sometimes :). He is very considerate about your time. i was sick a lot and missed a lot of class but if u email him youre good

Great professor. If you put forth effort and show you're trying he will work with you. It is not mandatory to show up to class, but you miss a lot if you don't. If you are the kind of person that needs someone on your ass, or to hold you accountable he is not the guy. You make your own grade, and he treats everyone fairly. Highly recommend.

I had not taken a Spanish course since high school, so when I had Professor Raburn for the 2000s, it was a great relief being eased back into the language. He teaches the course so those who just want to pass can, but also offers great insights for those furthering their studies in the language. I'd HIGHLY recommend him.

He makes it as easy to understand as possible. Attendance is not mandatory for 2001. Pick your own online vhlcentral hws. 1 5min presentation-topic of your choice. Allows work to be turned in late no penalties. Allows you to take tests at a later date. Works around your schedule since this is a night class; he understands ppl work and have kids.
Great
Nicest and most helpful prof I have had
This professor is amazing. He  works with you. He is very understanding! He just wants you to learn!
Great professor! Definitely one of the best I have taken yet. Funny, helpful and definitely relaxed. Take him if you take Spanish ever. Wish he taught other subjects

Best Spanish professor EVER. Really nice guy, not out to get you. Wants to help and grades fairly. Has interesting stories and lets class out early often. I hated taking Spanish classes my whole life until this class. TAKE HIM!
Seriously the best professor I've had. I was holding out to take his 2001 class, but I don't think he teaches at KSU anymore! So sad, he's such a good professor!
He's pretty much the best professor I've had yet. Super laid back, willing to help, and is very knowledgable. Awesome class, awesome guy!

Take him!!! I loves his class! It was my first time with Spanish and I learned a lot. Attendance not mandatory! He is funny too. You use the textbook everyday. He prepares you nicely for test if you come to class and do the online exercises. Very laid back. Very helpful and takes it slowly. :D
Great professor! Will help students in any way he can. Makes concepts easy.

Mr. Raburn is a great teacher. He is very approachable and great at explaining concepts.  He also knows a lot about culture and the process of learning a foreign language.  I wish he taught during the day.

Nice guy, but I will only recommend this professor to someone that can already speak a little bit of the language. If you have never had Spanish and need to start from the very beginning, he is not the one for you. The class is doable if that is your only class.

I love this man! Very laid back. Easy grader. Offers basically unlimited extra credit. Its my fault I got a B because I should have done some more extra credit.  He isn't a clear or easy to understand professor per say, however, if you are looking for a good grade, he is the man to take! The only prof i would recommend above him is Hance.

Professor Raburn is wonderful. He is so helpful, and will give extra credit out the wazoo. He will give you a 100 on the homework just for effort. I am not great at spanish, but he made the class really enjoyable and interesting. I would highly recommend Professor Raburn and would take him again in a heartbeat!
Great professor.He's very nice and funny. Take him!!If my major was Span, i'd take him for every class he taught.
Mr. Raburn's class was great.
Great professor, not a native speaker but he is very knowledgable and nice!
Took him for both 2001 and 2002. He explains everything very well and makes Spanish interesting.

I had him over the summer for SPAN 2001. Probably the easiest class and the most I've learned from in all of my Spanish classes. He grades generously and there are so many chances to do extra credit there's no chance in not getting an A. I'm taking him this semester for 2002

Crazy easy class.  Very understanding of what you're trying to say even if you can't quite get there.  Grades tests very generously. It seemed to be a lot of learning on your own time, but he was a great professor and I would definitely recommend him, especially if Spanish is not your thing.

Finally someone who knows what he is talking about! Great teacher! Teaches from a practical standpoint and really explains why things work the way they do in Spanish. You got to be ready to take in a lot more information, than what our lousy book is offering, but if you want to learn something - this is the guy for you!
Very nice, very helpful, extremely laid back. Accepted late assignments. Loved it!

I took his class during the summer semester. He was very laid back. He accepted late assginments often.  Was very understanding.  He taught more than what was found in the book. Test were easy and he was not strict on grades. Easy A as long as you try and communicate with him, you'll do just fine.
Teaches mostly grammer not alot of class interaction. Very boring but informative. If you try you willget an A.

Okay, for those of you that just didn't get spanish in high school and are now force to take it, This is the prof for you. He is great at explanations and seperating english from spanish. He has been doing this for a while and can really read classes to know when to slow down and when he's loosing people. He won't leave you behind.

Good teacher, assigns online homework, takes daily attendance, explains things clearly and mulitple times. keeps everyone on the same page. also gives study guides before the tests and talks about the final months before hand.
